title: BONUS EPISODE: Jerrod Carmichael On Coming Out, Cancel Culture, Dave Chappelle + New Special
itunes:author: Ebro In The Morning on HOT 97
itunes:summary:
Subscribe to "Summer Jam: Through The Years" - hosted by Laura Stylez!

Amazon: https://music.amazon.com/podcasts/6dfef9f3-4ff5-4d05-a857-6689c99aa999/summer-jam-through-the-years

Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/7MP62llakMJSXkJzwFclgq

Apple: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/summer-jam-through-the-years/id1627066431

Comedian Jerrod Carmichael sat down with Ebro in the Morning to have a great conversation on his decision to announce that he was gay to the world for the first time, the reaction from his family, cancel culture, comedians who get personal, and even shared a new film he is working on. His stand-up special 'Rothaniel' is streaming now on HBO Max.

SUMMER JAM TICKETS: HOT 97 Summer Jam Tickets, 2022 Concert Tour Dates | Ticketmaster

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
